Solutions to Beginner Programming Projects

Factorial Solution

 1# ---------------------------------------------------------
 2#                          NOTES
 3# ---------------------------------------------------------
 4
 5# ---------------------------------------------------------
 6#                         INCLUDES
 7# ---------------------------------------------------------
 8
 9# ---------------------------------------------------------
10#                         METHODS
11# ---------------------------------------------------------
12
13def factorial(number):
14
15    return_val = 1
16    if number > 1:
17        return_val = number * factorial(number - 1)
18
19    return return_val
20
21# ---------------------------------------------------------
22#                          MAIN
23# ---------------------------------------------------------
24
25
26if __name__ == "__main__":
27    num_user = input("Enter a number to compute a factorial")
28    result = factorial(int(num_user))
29    print(result)
30
31# ---------------------------------------------------------
32#                       END OF FILE
33# ---------------------------------------------------------
